casebody.data:
Pamela SMITH, respondent,
v.
FRESENIUS MEDICAL CARE CHICAGOLAND LLC, petitioner. No. 123998 Supreme Court of Illinois. January 31, 2019

Petition for Leave to Appeal Denied.

In the exercise of this Court's supervisory authority, the Appellate Court, First District, is directed to vacate its order in Smith v. Fresenius Medical Care Chicagoland LLC , case No. 1-18-0880 (08/09/18), denying leave to appeal. The appellate court is directed to allow leave to appeal.
